5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Iyas bin Abi Ramlah Ash-Shami said:“I heard a man asking Zaid bin Arqam: ‘Were you present with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) when there were two ‘Eid on one day?’ He said: ‘Yes.’ He said: ‘What did he do?’ He said: ‘He prayed the ‘Eid prayer, then he granted a concession not to pray the Friday, then he said: “Whoever wants to pray (Friday), let him do so.”’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا إِذَا اجْتَمَعَ الْعِيدَانِ فِي يَوْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning two ‘Eid occurring on the same day
